words.translatedSentence: I'm quite angry

words.meaning: contacting, (making) contact, getting in touch, communication, correspondence, call, message

words.sentence: あら おかわり なの 珍しい わ ね

words.meaning: to get better, to get well, to recover (from an illness), to be cured, to be restored, to heal

words.meaning: true character, true form, true colors (colours), identity, truth (of a mystery, phenomenon, etc.), origin
words.sentence: あの ヘビ みたい な の が お前 の 正体 な ん だろ
words.translatedSentence: It's your identity like that snake

words.meaning: to take (by force), to take away, to snatch, to steal, to rob (someone) of, to dispossess of, to deprive of, to usurp
words.sentence: 脳 を まさか お前 次 は 僕 の 脳 を 奪う つもり じゃ

words.sentence: 脳 を 奪う のに 成功 し て たら どうなって た ん だ

words.sentence: 偶然 だ 君 を 選ん だ わけ で は ない

words.sentence: 偶然 だ 君 を 選ん だ わけ で は ない
words.translatedSentence: I didn't choose you by chance

words.meaning: freely, at liberty, at will, as one likes

words.sentence: 悪夢 が 覚め て くれ ない
words.translatedSentence: Nightmare doesn't wake me

words.translatedSentence: Certainly, no matter what living book book, I didn't mention me

words.sentence: だが 無理 だ 脳 を 食わ ず に 成熟 し て しまって は もう 遅い
words.translatedSentence: But it's impossible, it's too late to mature without eating your brain

words.meaning: to be troubled, to be problematic

words.translatedSentence: Don't worry about it

words.translatedSentence: Use it very much

words.sentence: 向こう も 気づい た よう だ

words.meaning: important, essential, significant, major, key, principal
words.sentence: 君 に とって も これ は 重要 な こと で ある はず だ
words.translatedSentence: This should be an important thing for you

words.meaning: vigilance, caution, alertness, precaution, being on guard
words.sentence: 人間 の まま の お前 を 異常 な ほど 警戒 し て いる
words.translatedSentence: Unusually alert to you as a human

words.meaning: will (to do something), drive, motivation, enthusiasm, eagerness

words.translatedSentence: Motivated, fight here

words.sentence: し … 心臓
words.translatedSentence: Shi ... heart

words.meaning: vague, desultory, distracted, loose, half-hearted, diffuse, scattered
